articles.title: Report: Microsoft Working on 'Far Larger' In-House AI Model - PYMNTS.com
articles.description: Microsoft is reportedly working on a new, in-house AI model that is “far larger” than the other open source models it has trained.
articles.content:
Microsoft
 is reportedly working on a new, in-house artificial intelligence (AI) model that is far larger than the other open source models it has trained.
